meanings.definition: A mineral; a hydrated calcium aluminium sulfate hydroxide with formula: CaAl₂(SO₄)₂(OH)₄·7H₂O.
meanings.english_definition: A mineral; a hydrated calcium aluminium sulfate hydroxide with formula: CaAl₂(SO₄)₂(OH)₄·7H₂O.

etymology.value: From Exchange, the locality where it was first discovered, and -ite.
